edu.isep.sixcolors.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.isep.sixcolors.model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Parent model class, regrouping all the necessary elements to reflect a games state. It extends Observable so the view can update itself when the game has been modified It implements Serializable to be able to create saves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • deepCopy

        public Game deepCopy()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Deep copy by serialization Used to create guinea pigs to allow IA's to test their moves. Uses serialization tools in the apache.common library.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the Serialization fails
